topic.title: "Connection to UiServer Websocket was lost. Reconnecting..." everytime I load zerotalk
topic.body: Hi, new here. Everytime I load Zerotalk page, it reconects to the uiserver websocket. Is it normal?

1_1NLgFk1wAvq64yghgHGQMM99uhaxc6NCzZ.body:
> [erkan](#comment_81_1H8oKiRa7fGgUqS1hpUtaSYLvAqkaknbkf): Is this your own ZN you experience that?
> I have seen this often with the proxies. In that case, it'd be great to inform the operator.

Yes, my own zn.
